defaultAdvancedLoadPath.name: Default file load path
defaultAdvancedLoadPath.description: The default path to load files from.

defaultAdvancedSavePath.name: Default file save path
defaultAdvancedSavePath.description: The default path to save files to.

defaultURLSavePath.name: Default URL save path
defaultURLSavePath.description: The default path to save URLs to.

defaultYoutubeSavePath.name: Default YouTube save path
defaultYoutubeSavePath.description: The default path to save youtube clips to.

preferredOutputEncoder.name: preferredOutputEncoder
preferredOutputEncoder.description: The preferred encoder to select for output.

preferredCompatibilityEncoder.name: preferredCompatibilityEncoder
preferredCompatibilityEncoder.description: The preferred encoder to select for when converting to a compatible format.

defaultAllow100MB.name: Allow 100MB
defaultAllow100MB.description: Whether or not to allow 100MB files instead of the default 8MB.

defaultUseFullCPU.name: Use Full CPU
defaultUseFullCPU.description: Whether or not to use full CPU in vp9 encoding.

preferredVideoSize.name: preferredVideoSize
preferredVideoSize.description: The preferred video size to select.

defaultAudioVolume.name: defaultAudioVolume
defaultAudioVolume.description: The default audio volume to use.

playPauseKey.name: playPauseKey
playPauseKey.description: The key to use to play/pause.
